attributes.action: To ban the use of fireworks by the Public and the sale of them to the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that fireworks should only be used by organisations for the purpose of organised and Licensed displays.
We also Believe that this would ease the stress caused to old people, Autistic people, etc. family pets, wild animals
we also ask that for the misuse of fireworks that stiffer penalties should be enforced. We point out we are not against firework what we are against is there miss use in public places and there being let off at all times on the day and night

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
